summary: Implement cancellation scopes functionality for the PHP SDK, including support for nested scopes, hierarchical cancellation, and comprehensive testing of cancellation behavior across various scenarios.
userImpact: Users can now properly manage cancellation within workflows using nested scopes, enabling fine-grained control over which parts of their workflow logic respond to cancellation signals.
resolutionDetails: Feature fully implemented with comprehensive testing covering execution, cancellation, nested scopes, hierarchical cancellation, nested scope cancellation, coroutine stack checks, and other edge cases.
keyQuote: Implement functionality, Testing (Implement testing API) - Execution, Cancellation, Nested scopes, Hierarchical cancellation, Canceling a nested scope, Coroutine stack checks, Other cases
